# generic_name instance cad_format
# examples:
# nucleo_core NCC kicad_v4
# motor_driver MOT_1 kicad_v4
led_matrix LMX_1 kicad_v4
pwr_supply PWR kicad_v5


[MODULE_INTERCONNECTIONS]

# instance connector_purpose instance connector_purpose [options]
# examples:
# NCC MOTOR_CTRL_OUT_1 MOT_1 MOTOR_CTRL_IN # net_comparator_off warn_only
# NCC MOTOR_CTRL_OUT_2 MOT_2 MOTOR_CTRL_IN # net_comparator_off warn_only
LMX_1 "PWR CTRL IN" PWR "PWR CTRL OUT A" net_comparator_on warn_only
LMX_2 "PWR CTRL IN" PWR "PWR CTRL OUT B" net_comparator_on warn_only
